articles.title: Monash Sexual Health Researcher Awarded Australian Academy of Science's 2024 Gottschalk Medal - India Education Diary
articles.description: Internationally recognised sexual health epidemiologist Professor Eric Chow has received a 2024 Australian Academy of Science Gottschalk Medal, one of 22 annual honorific awards announced by the Academy today. The Gottschalk Medal honours the contrib
